page.title: 10Food.
page.content: I usually have 4 meals a day, breakfast, dinner, tea and supper. For breakfast I have a cereal then a round of toast and a cup of tea. For lunch in school I have four sandwiches, a bit of cake and a drink, but in the holidays for dinner I have anything from shepherd's pie to salad. For sweet I have from chocolate pudding with chocolate sauce to ice-cream. When I get in from school I sometimes have a Twix and a drink or something like that. For tea I have a cold meal; salad or sausage roll, or thing like that, with a cup of tea. But sometimes I have a cooked meal. For supper I have 3 biscuits ,the Jacob's ones, with some cheese and a drink of milk and sometimes I have some biscuits. By Edwin Pillans, aged 10.
